pageContext.other: Beautiful, 2-part, hand-drawn illustration displaying twisted metal-work.  With dimensions., Info under COLLECTIONS, SITE, PUBLICATIONS & ASSOCIATIONS in 2 different inks.
pageContext.associations: This was found with bracelet measuring 64 x 58 & twisted ring - diameter 23, they were linked together.  Part of a hoard.
pageContext.publications: Proc. Som A & N. H. S. v. p93 & XLVIII part 1. p84.,  Evans' B imp.s
pageContext.rightCorner: RED DOT followed by notation in pencil:,      B    (3)    [3 is actually circled], formerly read C, which has been struck through and replaced by B
pageContext.collection: Taunton Castle Museum.,     purch.d 1902    Stradling Coll.n
pageContext.site: England, Somerset, Edington, Edington Burtle, in a Turbary
